chart_description: This chart displays the number of open pipes of various plugins, containers, and system components in the server.

dimension_descriptions.agent_sd: Number of open pipes created by the agent.
dimension_descriptions.apps.plugin: Number of open pipes created by plugins for specific apps.
dimension_descriptions.auth: Number of open pipes created by authentication processes.
dimension_descriptions.containers: Number of open pipes created by containers.
dimension_descriptions.dhcp: Number of open pipes created by the DHCP process.
dimension_descriptions.ebpf.plugin: Number of open pipes created by the eBPF plugin.
dimension_descriptions.go.d.plugin: Number of open pipes created by the Go.D plugin.
dimension_descriptions.gui: Number of open pipes created by the GUI processes.
dimension_descriptions.httpd: Number of open pipes created by the HTTPD server process.
dimension_descriptions.kernel: Number of open pipes created by the kernel processes.
dimension_descriptions.kube-proxy: Number of open pipes created by the Kube-proxy process.
dimension_descriptions.kubelet: Number of open pipes created by the Kubelet process.
dimension_descriptions.metrics-server: Number of open pipes created by the Metrics server.
dimension_descriptions.mta: Number of open pipes created by the mail transfer agent.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: Number of open pipes created by the Netdata daemon.
dimension_descriptions.nfacct.plugin: Number of open pipes created by the NFACCT plugin.
dimension_descriptions.nosql: Number of open pipes created by NoSQL processes.
dimension_descriptions.other: Number of open pipes created by other miscellaneous processes.
dimension_descriptions.packagemanager: Number of open pipes created by package management processes.
dimension_descriptions.python.d.plugin: Number of open pipes created by the Python.D plugin.
dimension_descriptions.sql: Number of open pipes created by SQL processes.
dimension_descriptions.tc-qos-helper: Number of open pipes created by the TC-QoS helper process.
